String.string: Success Chance: <font color='#57bb35'>{finalProb}%</font>
<font color='#57bb35'>(Item XP {equipmentExp}/{maxExp})</font>
{showOnDamageAvailable}Equipment may be <font color='#FF0000'>damaged</font> on enchanting failure.
{showOnStepDownAvailable}Enchantment may <font color='#FF0000'>drop</font> on enchanting failure, and may be <font color='#FF0000'>damaged</font>.
Gold and materials will be used to enchant your equipment.
Success Chance: <font color='#57bb35'>{finalProb}%</font>
<font color='#57bb35'>(Item XP {equipmentExp}/{maxExp})</font>
{showOnDamageAvailable}Equipment may be <font color='#FF0000'>damaged</font> on promotion failure.
{showOnDamageAvailable}Equipment may be <font color='#FF0000'>damaged</font> or be <font color='#FF0000'>destroyed</font> on promotion failure.
Repair Chance: <font color='#57bb35'>{finalProb}%</font>
Repair equipment before enchanting or promoting it.

Success Chance: {finalProb}%
(Total of the factors below, rounded up to 2 decimal places.)
- Item XP advantage {enchantEquipExp}%

- Enchanting Failure advantage {enchantFailed}%

What is Item XP?
Level 65 equipment gains Item XP when you complete certain Vanguard requests. Item XP significantly increases the chance to enchant or upgrade items.
- Reaching maximum Item XP, shown on the equipment's tooltip, grants maximum enchantment advantage. You can gain up to {supExp} Item XP.

What is Item XP?
Level 65 equipment gains Item XP when you complete certain Vanguard requests. Item XP significantly increases the chance to enchant or upgrade items.
- Reaching maximum Item XP, shown on the equipment's tooltip, grants maximum enchantment advantage. You can gain up to <font color='#ff0000'>{supExp}</font> Item XP.
<font color='#57bb35'>Upgrade Success {finalProb}%</font>
<font color='#DBB006'>(Total of the factors below, rounded up to 2 decimal places.)</font>
- Upgrade Failure advantage {enchantFailed}%
- Active Events advantage {enchantEvent}%
- Bonus Effect advantage {enchantAbnormality}%
- TERA Rewards Level advantage {enchantVipSystem}%
<font color='#57bb35'>Repair Chance: {finalProb}%</font>
<font color='#DBB006'>(Total of the factors below, rounded up to 2 decimal places.)</font>
- Repairing Failure advantage {enchantFailed}%

[Damaged Equipment]
Equipment is sometimes damaged when enchanting or promoting.
Damaged equipment is usable, but cannot be enchanted or promoted.
To enchant or promote a damaged equipment, it must be repaired first.
